sentences.en: Cities such as Berlin and Dresden were virtually razed to the ground.
sentences.cn: 诸如柏林和德累斯顿这样的城市基本上被夷为平地。

sentences.en: Dozens of villages have been razed.
sentences.cn: 几十座村庄已被夷为平地。

sentences.en: In 1162 Milan was razed to the ground by imperial troops.
sentences.cn: 1162年米兰被帝国军队夷为平地。

sentences.en: The conquerors tried to raze the very name of the peoples national hero from their memories.
sentences.cn: 征服者妄图把人民的民族英雄的名字从他们的记忆中抹去.

sentences.en: The owners intend to raze the hotel and erect an office building on the site.
sentences.cn: 业主打算夷平酒店和竖立一座办公大楼在网站上.

words.tran_cn: 被夷平（raze的过去式及过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 夷为平地； 彻底破坏
trans.tran_en: to completely destroy a town or building
